        Nineteen Sixties

        A collection inspired by the era’s cultural landmarks—cinema, fashion, music, literature, and art—alongside the iconic figures who shaped them. Handcrafted in Japan, each style features 18k white and yellow gold-plated corewire inspired by the intricate designs of vintage leather-bound books. Together, the collection's exclusive details capture the essence of 1960s style.

        A rectangular sunglass with a deep lens shape and striking lines, Devaney features a distinctly bold shape. Its soft yet sharp design and distinctive colorways evoke the perfect accessory for the musicians of the decade.​

        A bold, square optical frame with a striking silhouette, Alfrey features a deep lens shape and exclusive 1960s-inspired accents. Designed for the intellectuals, it captures the essence of larger-than-life literary legends.

        A panto-style sunglass with a timeless, vintage design, Hayton is a standout style that feels fit for a movie star of the time. Custom corewire is inspired by the gilded patterns found on leather bound books of the era.
